episodes.synopsis: Cutting-edge comedy is in the house as P. Diddy presents the next generation of raw, risk-taking quipsters, who throw down today's boldest material.
episodes.title: Volume 1

episodes.synopsis: Fearless, cutting-edge comedy is in the house as superstar P. Diddy presents the next generation of raw, risk-taking comedians.
episodes.title: Volume 2

episodes.synopsis: Cutting-edge comedy is in the house as superstar P. Diddy and host Doug E. Fresh present the next generation of risk-taking comedians.
episodes.title: Volume 3

video.title: P. Diddy Presents the Bad Boys of Comedy
video.synopsis: Doug E. Fresh hosts this edgy comedy series featuring up-and-coming funnymen, who deliver outrageous routines about the opposite sex, race and more.
